tool.name: BWA SAMSE
tool.description: Generate alignments in the SAM format given single-end reads. Repetitive hits will be randomly chosen.
tool.command:
bwa samse -n $maxOcc -r $readgroup $in.db.fasta $in.sai $in.fastq > $out.sam
# -------------------------------------------------------------------------
# bwa samse [-n maxOcc] <in.db.fasta> <in.sai> <in.fq> > <out.sam>
# Generate alignments in the SAM format given single-end reads.
# Repetitive hits will be randomly chosen.
# Flags:
# -n Maximum number of alignments to output in the XA tag for reads paired
# properly. If a read has more than INT hits, the XA tag will not be
# written. [3]
# -r Specify the read group in a format like `@RG\tID:foo\tSM:bar'. [null]
# Example:
# bwa samse database.fasta aln_sa.sai short_read.fastq > aln.sam
# -------------------------------------------------------------------------

param.name: maxOcc
param.label: Maximum number of alignments to output in the XA tag for reads paired properly. If a read has more than INT hits, the XA tag will not be written. [3]

param.name: readgroup
param.label: Specify the read group in a format like `@RG\tID:foo\tSM:bar'. [null]
